attributes.action: bring back football to the masses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask that all UK international (england,scotland,ireland,wales)football matches home and away games,should be available to the majority of supporters and not just those that can afford to subscibe to pay television.
We ask that UK international matches should be broadcast on free to air television, channels so that the majority and not the minority get to support there teams.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "bring back football to the masses."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22659


Prime Minister's Office
